languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс медленно отстраняется.{/n} "Пожалуй... пожалуй, так будет лучше для всех. Я не хочу морочить тебе голову, если тебе это неприятно. Благодарю тебя за прямоту".
{n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс медленно отстраняется.{/n} "Пожалуй... пожалуй, так будет лучше для всех. Я не хочу морочить тебе голову, если тебе это неприятно. Благодарю тебя за прямоту".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."
{n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."
{n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."
{n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

languages.text: {n}海因里希慢慢移开了视线。{/n}“我猜……我猜这样对你我都好。如果这段关系会给你带来痛苦，那我就不想再继续下去了。谢谢你的坦诚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希慢慢移开了视线。{/n}“我猜……我猜这样对你我都好。如果这段关系会给你带来痛苦，那我就不想再继续下去了。谢谢你的坦诚。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se aleja lentamente.{/n} «Supongo... supongo que es lo mejor para ambos. Si le causa dolor, entonces es mejor no seguir juntos. Gracias por su sinceridad».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se aleja lentamente.{/n} «Supongo... supongo que es lo mejor para ambos. Si le causa dolor, entonces es mejor no seguir juntos. Gracias por su sinceridad».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはゆっくりと身を引く。{/n}「そうだな…その方がお互いのためだろう。あなたを苦しめるのであれば、このまま一緒にいたくはない。率直に言ってくれてありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはゆっくりと身を引く。{/n}「そうだな…その方がお互いのためだろう。あなたを苦しめるのであれば、このまま一緒にいたくはない。率直に言ってくれてありがとう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix recule lentement.{/n} « J'imagine... J'imagine que c'est la meilleure chose à faire pour nous deux. Je refuse de poursuivre notre idylle si elle vous fait souffrir. Merci pour votre franchise. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recule lentement.{/n} « J'imagine... J'imagine que c'est la meilleure chose à faire pour nous deux. Je refuse de poursuivre notre idylle si elle vous fait souffrir. Merci pour votre franchise. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix entfernt sich langsam.{/n} "Nun ... Ich schätze, das wäre wohl in der Tat das Beste für uns beide. Ich möchte nicht länger mit Euch zusammen sein, wenn Euch das nur Schmerz bereitet. Danke für Eure Offenheit."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix slowly draws away.{/n} "I suppose... I suppose that would be best for both of us. I don't want to continue to be together if it causes you pain. Thank you for your candour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix entfernt sich langsam.{/n} "Nun ... Ich schätze, das wäre wohl in der Tat das Beste für uns beide. Ich möchte nicht länger mit Euch zusammen sein, wenn Euch das nur Schmerz bereitet. Danke für Eure Offenheit."
